metadata.synopsis: A reaction to a dead avatar moving an item/touching them.

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: You are welcome, noamuth. Be free.
0.context:
NodeContext: noamuth - noh-AH-muth (wanderer, referring to a spirit of a former ally she felt the presnce of)

Aluve abban - ah-LOO-veh AB-ban (farewell, ally - speaking to the spirit of an ally she felt the presnce of)

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: A cold chill. Spirits walk among us.
